transcription: I'm in my bag like I'm racing in a burlap potato sack I be with some niggas if they starving they gonna take your sack Smell like a Jamaican I might need me a Jamaican hat I grew up on 4A, 2 on 4 I stay on Mack I'm gon' try and be garlic cause I'm starving and they hate on that And I'm on some shit you never felt before debate on that If you get on a beat with me you wouldn't know what to say on that Niggas always tryna borrow shit and never pay you back  I don't affiliate with it Look at all of these women They be all in they feelings Bout to lose they fucking mind Cause I don't pay them attention If these niggas getting locked Rappers spilling they business Everyday, cookie keep my eyes Don't not fucking stop, hella glazed I'm the Cadillac of rap You a urban escapade I'm a east side nigga I just wanna escalate Stay alive through all levels In my city, streets are raised  We got on Rollies, and we only ridin' Rollies Yo baby mama on me, now yo bitch get on the Rollies  I'm in orange Porsches, with bad bitches I'm ferocious Kush, Potent, they growin' in by the ocean I know cause it got me floatin', I'm blowin' from coast to coast to put that play in motion Y'all wanna be on some John Gotti shit, I'm from Detroit I'm tryna be like Maserati Rick, motherfucker!  And we only riding Rollies Your baby mama on me Now your bitch got on the rollie  Shoes, they deep, we runnin' One phone call, they come in I'm on some west side shit Get your best guy hit, do that Teflon shit Mean tight, hit you with the mean right Catch you with the gas station, hit you with the green light  And I'm hoppin' in that van and goin' ape shit Kill the head, body fall, I'm a fake shit Niggas think they took the cuffs off my wrist Buffs on 41 on my wrist Niggas think they took the shackles off my ankles Diamond link, diamond mink to my ankles Yeah, I got the game from my uncle, niggas Nephew runnin' around this bitch thumpin', niggas Gang runnin' around this bitch thumpin', niggas Fuck the niggas, they deserve it, they was nothin', niggas  Ay, Danny, show him what's up, Mac died!  Presidential Rollie, I'm a Mac El President The demon in the streets, bro, my family say I'm heaven-sent Feelin' like Lorenz Tate with all these dead presidents Chinese food with chopsticks at my residence Cuz I got a hundred bands stuffed in my letterman  Now your bitch got on a rollie
